ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Sider Silks & Tailoring (Silk Swatch)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thankyou so much for the responce!! I went to the link & found a recipe:) sacred Tunare silk: silk swatch, celestial essence, blessed dust of tunare 135.
ygData.messageBody:
Thankyou so much for the responce!! I went to the link & found a
recipe:) sacred Tunare silk: silk swatch, celestial essence, blessed
dust of tunare 135. Finding all of these things to make these
recipes is hard sometimes. Thankyou so much for responding to me!!!

Mari


--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "erik" <naslund@a...> wrote:
> > From: "magickal_mari" <Magickal-Mari@c...>
> ]>

can

to

do
> > with Spider Silk or the Silk Swatch I make from it?? If anyone
has

Thanks!
> > Good luck to all!!
